title: PLEASE RIOT, RESET REFUNDS YEARLY :( :( :(
body:
I just accidentally bought myself a $20 skin instead of gifting to my friend (distracted). Riot could you please allow each account to refund 3 a YEAR instead of just 3 and that's it??? 
Please :(

replies.body:
Send in a support ticket and they may be able to help you, not a guarantee, but they may be able to help. 

As for resetting refunds, that isn't a financially sound move and they do give you 3 to start with which you can use on anything you want...
What about if you've been playing for years and used up all your refunds really fast not realising the quality of them and years later make a mistake :D

No good business, in terms of cosmetic decisions, would give you 3 refunds a year because it doesn't actually keep you spending money... As an example, say you had Pulsefire Ezreal because you played him at the time and then stopped but when Spirit Guard Udyr was released, you didn't have enough RP to buy him. So you refund Pulsefire Ezreal because you may not play Ez anymore and just buy spirit guard udyr with the refunded RP instead of the large amount you'd normally spend to get him.

LoL players were spoiled to even get three of them in the first place for nothing, I'm sorry that sounds harsh but it's just not smart business for them to allow resetting refunds. As I said, send in a support ticket, that's an innocent mistake that they may consider fixing, but giving you a full refund on the purchase isn't the solution I would think, they would probably have to find a workaround.
